name: web-dites-outreach
author: Tal Miterani tal@careboxhealth.com
@comment devDependencies: These are the comments for the `dependencies` section.
The name of the section being commented is included in the key after the `@comment` 'annotation' to ensure the keys are unique.

@comment devDependencies.vue: vuetify version 2 does not support vue 3, this is why we use last version of vue 2
@comment devDependencies.webpack: wevpack vesion 5+ probably works only with vew-loader version 16+, this impact html-webpack-plugin,as wepack-cli, webpack-der-server, css-loader, sass-loader vesions as well
@comment devDependencies.url-loader: version +3 if compatible with npm version +7 (more advanced version of node)
